```{r}
library(tidyverse)

dat <- read_csv("C:/Users/britchi3/Documents/Statistics-Notebook/Data/car_dat.csv") %>% 
  filter(Year > 2010)
```

```{r}
plot_original <- dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Miles, Price))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_bw()

dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Miles, log(Price), color = as.factor(Year)))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE, color = "black")+
  theme_bw()

my_lm <- lm(log(Price)~Miles, data = dat)
summary(my_lm)
par(mfrow = 1:2)
plot(my_lm, which=1:2)
plot(my_lm$residuals)
```
